sentences.en: The original interview notes were subsequently lost.
sentences.cn: 采访记录原稿后来丢失了。

sentences.en: Subsequently, new guidelines were issued to all employees.
sentences.cn: 随后，新的准则发给了所有雇员。

sentences.en: He subsequently worked on Boeing's 747, 767 and 737 jetliner programmes.
sentences.cn: 他后来从事了波音747、767 和 737喷气式飞机的项目。
